es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.animation
Class Transition

java.lang.Object
  es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.animation.Transition
All Implemented Interfaces:
Timed, Cloneable
public class Transition
extends Object
implements Cloneable, Timed

This class holds the information for an animation transition

Author:
Eugenio Marchiori

Field Summary
private  long time
          Time (duration) of the transition
private  int type
          Type of the transition: TYPE_FADEIN, TYPE_NONE, TYPE_HORIZONTAL or TYPE_VERTICAL
static int TYPE_FADEIN
          The transition makes the previous frame disappear while the new one appears
static int TYPE_HORIZONTAL
          The transition places the new frame over the old one from top to bottom
static int TYPE_NONE
          The transition does nothing
static int TYPE_VERTICAL
          The transition places the new frame over the old one from left to right

Transition()
          Creates a new empty transition
